name: Carreira Beauty Portal da Beleza Ltda
description: Operator of an online B2B marketplace platform intended to cater services to beauty professionals and salons in Brazil. The company's platform provides services like career development and digital presence, enabling companies in the sector of beauty and well-being to find opportunities and gain more knowledge.
